scripts.test-inline-script-tags: node src/cli/inlineScriptTags.js test/testInlineScriptTags/index.html index.html; cat index.html
scripts.test-inline-stylesheets: node src/cli/inlineStylesheets.js test/testInlineStylesheets/index.html index.html; cat index.html
scripts.test-inline-images: node src/cli/inlineImages.js test/testInlineImages/index.html index.html; cat index.html
scripts.test-inline-requires:
node src/cli/inlineRequires.js test/testInlineRequires/main.js temp.js; cat temp.js; echo '
'; node temp.js
scripts.test-inline-requires-2:
node src/cli/inlineRequires.js test/testInlineRequires/nested/main2.js temp.js; cat temp.js; echo '
'; node temp.js
scripts.test-inline-environment-variables: PORT=3000 node src/cli/inlineEnvironmentVariables.js test/testInlineEnvironmentVariables/main.js temp.js; cat temp.js
